short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to stick notes for specific url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Notes is a chrome extension that allows user to save notes based on a part(tag) of a url. So whenever you visit the url it will show notes saved related to tag in the url.
